name: Connection Ivy, Eniel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], look at two cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one card with grade equal to or less than your vanguard from among them, call it to (RC), and discard the rest.
flavor: Let's go together? It'll definitely be fun!

name: Connection Ivy, Eniel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], look at two cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one card with grade equal to or less than your vanguard from among them, call it to (RC), and discard the rest.

name: Kanone Schnellkrieger
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if your Order Zone has a Set Order, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor: An artillery support unit mounted with a highly precise fire-support system.

name: Trickstar
effect: [CONT](RC):This unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects.
flavor: You're interesting. Hey hey, lets play together.
